alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Albany and northwestern Laramie Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 128 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Baldy Peak to 7 miles north of Yellow Pine Campground to near University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tie City Campground, North Crow Campground, Horse Creek and Yellow Pine Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 319 and 322. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
